name: RoundUp App for WooCommerce
author: RoundUp App

sections.description:
RoundUp App for WooCommerce

This plugin allows for you to link your RoundUp App merchant account with your WooCommerce store page so that your customers can donate their change to the nonprofit you have selected. A RoundUp App account is required to be able to use this plugin, please visit https://roundupapp.com for more information.
sections.changelog:
1.0.8

  • New Feature: Fixed Donations, A merchant can now set a single dollar amount for the donation.

1.0.7

  • Bug fixes and adding debugging tools to the settings area.

1.0.6

  • Whole dollar amount controlled by settings instead of cart total.

1.0.5

  • Added Beta mode, bug fixes

1.0.4

  • Resolved issue with floating regular price amount on variations.

1.0.3

  • Products won’t require regenerating WooCommerce product table

1.0.1

  • Patch to handle the public API key
  • Improve onboarding

1.0.0

  • First Release

short_description: RoundUp App for WooCommerce - Allow customers to donate their change from every order.
